Package game

Class Chest

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
game.Chest
All Implemented Interfaces:
DesignOSoulsAddOn, Capable, Printable, DropsSoulToken, Resettable, Unboxing
public class Chest
extends Ground
implements Resettable, Unboxing, DropsSoulToken
Ground item that has 50% chance to spawn mimic or soul tokens
